评论概述: Great for modest and loose gym top
评论详情: I wanted a top that is long enough to cover my butt and that’s loose. I don’t like tops to cling to my stomach and this stop fits these exact desires! It’s soft, breathable and I like the thumb holes. I would iron it just to knock out the wrinkles but it’s amazing & I will be getting more colors!
I was looking for a top that was both pretty and practical for my winter workout. This one is perfect and true to size.

I like the feel of the fabric. It is very soft. The sleeves are long enough to actually use the thumb holes without it pulling from the shoulder for me. I will Be interested to see how it holds up in a few washes. I may be ordering another one.

评论概述: I really changed my mind on this one

Quality and comfort are good.  Not flattering from the side, poofs out in the back oddly.  I still like it for a lightweight long sleeve workout shirt.
This top has plenty of length. I love the pleat in the back. It is very comfortable to wear.
Very nice soft material. True to size chart. Please follow size chart to make it comfortable for yourself!
Horribly cheap material - can't get the wrinkles out.
I'm 5'5", 120 lbs., purchased a small.  Washes well (cold water), hang to dry.  Sleeves a bit tight but I stretched them out and it helped

I like the way it looks and feels on me! Its soft and comfortable

评论概述: The one I received was defective, unfortunately
评论详情: Unfortunately it was defective. There were no thumb holes and the shirt was short like a crop top. It was a nice, soft fabric, though. I sent it back.
Great top!
The fabric was much cheaper than expected.

It’s actually true to size. I wear a S/M, 36 C, and I usually wear a M/L in my workout tops because I don’t like them to be too tight, ride up, or cling. The fabric is soft, thin, moisture-wicking, and stretchy. It didn’t ride up during my workouts. I like the detailing on the back although I do think it made my back look broader than it already is, coral color is really pretty, and the thumbholes. The sleeves were the perfect length for me and I did use the thumb holes but if u have long arms the sleeves might not fit right. It was comfortable to workout in but it wasn’t very flattering on me. It fits but I would’ve liked a looser and longer fit. It arrived really wrinkled but I just tossed it in the dryer and most of the wrinkles fell out.

Pros: The color is great. I got the wine red, and it's a lovely deep shade. The fabric is soft and lightweight. Good for layers. The sleeves are long enough. I hate the feeling of constantly tugging the sleeves down when a long-sleeved shirt doesn't quite reach or stay at the wrist. Solid seam around the thumb hole. This should be a useful feature while working out.  Cons: It's too thin. While layering can be nice, I don't wear long sleeves unless I want at least a little warmth, and there is none here. The seams are not completely straight. The seam on one side comes forward a bit. It's not terribly noticeable, but still a flaw. It might run a bit small. The L fits my 37" chest with no room to spare.
Very cute long sleeved shirt, on the thin side, cute thumb holes. But definitely on the small side.
Use for walking and sun protection! Like white shirts for summer!

评论概述: Sized normal.  Super soft and comfortable.  Highly recommend.
评论详情: Honest review here.  I was very happy with this navy top. I got the XL and I weight 75lbs and it fits loosely but not too big. I highly recommend it. It's very soft yet breathable and comfortable.  The material is 95% modal and 5% spandex...so it has a nice stretch to it but is still super soft. Love that it does not have polyster.  Love and highly recommend.
Great workout top - doesn’t restrict in any way, and doesn’t look like a rag.
These are perfect for workout or just around the house. They fit well, are comfortable and are perfect for layering.  I am ordering more!

I love the back of this top. The front is sadly very plain! Oh well. It's for workout, so...  Pros: Super cute back detail longer sleeves that can pull down and have thumb holes Breathable fabric Washed up well in the wash and dryer Nice red wine color Great value Fabric feels lightweight  Cons: None
Wrinkles Super easy! Very comfortable but I was a bit disappointed with the quality of the fabric.
A friend recommended these and I now have them in three colors and two black!!!
